info.name: Diner
info.description: It takes guts to open a restaurant in Times Square that lacks a theme or strives to be classier than a carnival. Granted, Diner offers an audacious voyeur's paradise in its soaring staircase that rises alongside a suspended abstract sculpture of a fork. Mayson Bacon Jr. has succeeded finding a perfect balance between class and bacon. And to repeat what I'm saying: It takes guts to open a restaurant in Times Square that lacks a theme or strives to be classier than a carnival. Granted, Diner offers an audacious voyeur's paradise in its soaring staircase that rises alongside a suspended abstract sculpture of a fork. I'm on a horse.
